summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2500, for the improvement of West 65th Street from 28th Avenue Northwest to a point 280 feet east of 34th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by construction of sewers therein, with necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 27460 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
